title: Remembering Doug Shapiro: The ‘Bullet’ Who Blazed a Trail in American Cycling
content:
Bruce Hildenbrand remembers cycling's 'Bullet,' a pioneering rider who blazed trails, won big races, and touched lives.

Read the full article at Remembering Doug Shapiro: The ‘Bullet’ Who Blazed a Trail in American Cycling on Velo.
